summary: This bill, the Territorial Response and Access to Veterans’ Essential Lifecare Act (TRAVEL Act of 2025), aims to improve healthcare access for veterans residing in U.S. territories and possessions. It authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs Secretary to assign VA physicians to temporarily serve as traveling physicians in these areas, providing healthcare at VA facilities. The bill also mandates coordination with non-Department medical providers and allows for relocation or retention bonuses for traveling physicians.
